messages.message: Invalid KTXorientation value. The value must match /^[rl]$/ for 1D, /^[rl][du]$/ for 2D and /^[rl][du][oi]$/ for 3D texture types.
messages.details: Dimension 0 is "x" but it must be either "r" or "l".

messages.message: Invalid KTXorientation value. The value must match /^[rl]$/ for 1D, /^[rl][du]$/ for 2D and /^[rl][du][oi]$/ for 3D texture types.
messages.details: Dimension 1 is "x" but it must be either "d" or "u".

messages.message: Invalid KTXorientation value. The value must match /^[rl]$/ for 1D, /^[rl][du]$/ for 2D and /^[rl][du][oi]$/ for 3D texture types.
messages.details: Dimension 2 is "x" but it must be either "o" or "i".
